Room.Name: Wildlife Preserve Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path along the southern side of the Lithium Inlet.
Room.LongDescription: The path drops steeply to the northeast, and rises gradually to the west, forming a tranquil and quite place to overlook a wildlife preserve on the north side of the Lelion Beach and Park. Great birds of some type you have never seen anywhere else float in the sky above, occasionly diving into the water to the north. Across the Lithium Inlet you can see several shops and a pub which you know is the Might and Muscle Tavern.
